property.name: text
property.value:
Conway's Game of Life is a simple cellular automaton where given a matrix of cells, a cell lives or dies depending on the number of neighbors.
This demo displays the output in a graphical widget.
See Life.xml for a code generation version.

property.name: text
property.value: Generate the low and high neighbors that we should check. Handle wrapping on the world matrix. If the input index is at the high edge,then we wrap around and check the 0th index. If the input index is at the low edge, then we wrap around and check the matrixSize-1 index.

property.name: text
property.value: Generate the low and high neighbors that we should check. Handle wrapping on the world matrix. If the input index is at the high edge,then we wrap around and check the 0th index. If the input index is at the low edge, then we wrap around and check the matrixSize-1 index.
